extendedInfo.description: CARRIER ENTERPRISE strives to make life as an HVAC Professional easier and faster. The HVAC Contractor Assist provides access to product information and easy to use tools while on the go.Saving you time and hassle through innovationâ¦do you know any other HVAC distributor with this kind of technology?Key Features:* See current Product Availability at CARRIER ENTERPRISE Stores Near You (Product Availability)* Search for an HVAC equipment model, see the Bill Of Materials, check availability at CARRIER ENTERPRISE locations (Equipment B.O.M.)* View Spec Sheets, Wiring Diagrams, Installation Guides, Consumer Literature, etc. for CARRIER ENTERPRISE Products (Document Library)* See nearby CARRIER ENTERPRISE locations, their Hours of Operation, get Directions, call the store (Branch Locator)* Receive Push Notifications of Special Offers & Promotions at CARRIER ENTERPRISE* Scan QR Code & UPC Bar Codes for fast product look ups* See Turn by Turn Driving Directions to CARRIER ENTERPRISE locations* Light up attics, closets and basements while you work with the built in FlashlightOur goal is to make your life in the field more efficient and doing business with us easier. That's our passion...stay tuned for more!

reviews.comment: Jerrod is a spammer from a competitor. For the user that wants manuals etc, that is not what the intent is of this app. You should be going to Hvacpartners for that. Expect E.P.I.C integration shortly for parts reference.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Just as advertised. I build chillers by converting ruud ac units. Still learning so this really came in handy
reviews.author: jason williamson

reviews.comment: Cool apparently. Not much tech help though. Needs manuals, charging charts and trouble light codes.
